Description:
We are offering you a chance to become a professional Electrical Technical Office Engineer while getting paid a decent salary with social and medical insurance.Your job would include the following:Designing new electrical systems (normal power and light current)
Creating 2D shop drawings for electrical systems using AutoCAD
Creating 3D BIM models for electrical systems using Revit
Carrying out quantity takeoffs for electrical projectsSkills
